frontmatter.description: This lesson covers testing React components, using Jest and Enzyme to run tests on them, and how to make assertions on mounted React elements. We'll go into the difference between React Components and Elements, understand the purpose of the Enzyme software library, and mount React elements in order to make assertions about them.
frontmatter.title: Component Testing
